name: McGuffin (Prototype)
description:
McGuffin is a Pixel Puzzle Platformer where you must use the mini-map to look for hidden objects and complete stories.

This is a Under Development project that is On Hold for now. Dunno if i'm going to continue with it if I do I'll put here the beta when it's done.

I wanted to redefine the entire game and reprogramm its mechanics since most of it was done using Modular scripts given in School. For now I'll be focusing in other project to enhance my skills for 3d Rigging/Animation and UI Design.
